{"id":869835133,"question_id":520,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1672678359,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/869835133/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Detect Capital","memory":"40.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean detectCapitalUse(String word) {\n        boolean isStartCapital = false;\n        boolean isAllCapital = true;\n        boolean isSomeFollowingCapital = false;\n        for(int i = 0; i < word.length(); i++) {\n            Character c = word.charAt(i);\n            if(i == 0) {\n                isStartCapital = Character.isUpperCase(c);\n                isAllCapital = isStartCapital;\n            } else {\n                if(Character.isUpperCase(c)) {\n                    isSomeFollowingCapital = true;\n                } else {\n                    isAllCapital = false;\n                }\n                if(!isAllCapital && isSomeFollowingCapital) break;\n            }\n        }\n        return (isStartCapital && !isSomeFollowingCapital) || (isAllCapital) || (!isStartCapital && !isSomeFollowingCapital);\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"detect-capital","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
